overview: Elaine Hammerstein stars in this independently produced drama. She plays Mary Dolan, a dancer at a Bowery caf√©, who is in love with co-worker Jimmy Evarts (Theodore Von Eltz). Jimmy gets in a fight with an East Side tough and finds a wallet on him belonging to a big theatrical manager. Jimmy, however, is accused of being the one who stole it and is thrown in jail.
title: Paint and Powder
